strategy.title: Overview
steps: Kill all 23 rare spawns in Northrend zones
Similar to Bloody Rare but in Northrend
Time-Lost Proto-Drake is NOT part of this achievement

strategy.title: Recommended Addons
steps: SilverDragon or NPCScan - alerts when rare is nearby
HandyNotes + RareScanner - shows spawn points on map
TomTom - waypoint navigation to spawn locations

strategy.title: Efficient Hunting
steps: Make a circuit through all Northrend zones
Storm Peaks and Icecrown have multiple rares each
Use group finder to hop servers for more chances
Vyragosa shares spawn with Time-Lost - if you see her, kill for achievement
Some rares are in caves or phased areas - check Wowhead comments
